verses.verse: And in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> <S%H3947>himself<s%>, and took the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds<s%>, <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3395>Jeroham<s%>, and <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3076>Jehohanan<s%>, and <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5744>Obed<s%>, and <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5718>Adaiah<s%>, and <S%H478>Elishaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2147>Zichri<s%>, into covenant with <S%H1285>him<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4428>them<s%>, Behold, the king's <S%H1121>son<s%> shall <S%H4427>reign<s%>, as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> concerning the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>.

But let none <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, save the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and they that <S%H8334>minister<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>; they shall come <S%H935>in<s%>, for they are <S%H6944>holy<s%>: but all the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

So the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> and all <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to all that <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%>: and they <S%H3947>took<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H376>men<s%>, those that were to come <S%H935>in<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%>; with those that were to <S%H3318>go<s%> out on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%>; for <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H6358>dismissed<s%> not the <S%H4256>courses<s%>.

And he <S%H5975>set<s%> all the <S%H5971>people<s%>, every <S%H376>man<s%> with his <S%H7973>weapon<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, from the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> to the <S%H8042>left<s%> <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, along by the <S%H4196>altar<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%>, by the <S%H4428>king<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And when <S%H6271>Athaliah<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7323>running<s%> and <S%H1984>praising<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, she <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>:

So they <S%H7760>made<s%> <S%H3027>way<s%> for <S%H935>her<s%>; and she went to the <S%H3996>entrance<s%> of the <S%H5483>horse<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>: and they slew her <S%H4191>there<s%>.

And <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> between <S%H5971>himself<s%>, and all the people, and the <S%H4428>king<s%>, that they should be <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%>, and brake it <S%H5422>down<s%>, and <S%H7665>brake<s%> his <S%H4196>altars<s%> and his <S%H6754>images<s%> in <S%H7665>pieces<s%>, and <S%H2026>slew<s%> <S%H4977>Mattan<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altars<s%>.
